title.narrative: U-LEAD SALAR Support to the Roll-out Phase 2018-2020
U-LEAD SKR stöd till roll-out fasen 2018-2020

description.narrative: For the Roll-out phase of U-LEAD, Sida will procure implementing partners to support the establishment of up to 575 administrative service centres. This contribution is about SALAR's role to select feasible local authorities and together with them work out a programme for how the establishment of the administrative service centre should be carried out in each local authority. This will be executed in four batches, with around 150 local authorities in each batch. SALAR will also work with policy support, methods support, peer review and exchange between administrative service centers and be responsible for coordination and implementation of communication and visibility in Sida's U-LEAD programme.

För Roll-out fasen av U-LEAD kommer Sida att handla upp implementerande partners för att stödja etablerandet av upp till 575 administrativa service centran i Ukraina. Denna insats avser att SKL ska arbeta med att välja ut lämpliga kommuner och tillsammans med dessa arbeta fram ett underlag för hur etableringen av det administrativa service centrat ska gå till i respektive kommun. Detta kommer att ske i fyra omgångar, med cirka 150 kommuner i varje omgång. Dessutom kommer SKL i denna insats arbeta med policyrådgivning, metodstöd, utbyte mellan etablerade administrativa service center och med att samordna och övergripande ansvara för kommunikation och synlighet inom Sidas U-LEAD program.

U-LEAD with Europe contributes to the implementation of the Decentralization Reform in Ukraine. Component 2 on "Support to Improved Administrative Service Delivery", coordinated by Sida, aims at establishment of up to 600 Administrative Service Centres, as well as development IT systems (Trembita and Vulyk) for efficient e-governance that will enable safe and secure delivery of Government-to-Government, Government-to-Business and Government-to- Citizens public and administrative services at the central, regional and local levels.

sector.narrative: Decentralisation and support to subnational government

tag.narrative: 16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: Most of the activities planned during the implementation period were implemented according to plan. The final report will be submitted according to the agreement ( end September 2021) but due to regular follow - up meetings Sida has been able to discuss any upcoming situations with SALAR on a weekly basis. The Covid19 pandemic had major effects on some of the foreseen activities such as peer - to -peer exhange and trainee programme were postponed and eventually not implemented at full scale. During most of the implementing period the situation in the country was too complex and grave to allow for activities taht included travelling and people to people exchange. The renovation and construction activities were mostly on schedule and finalised according to plan. The policy activities - analysis and help-desk were much appreciated due to the pandemic as the hromadas were faced with new and unfamiliar obstacles to perform their duties. Even thought the support was provided online it proved to be instrumental in providing the hromadas with tools to adapt to the pandemic and their ability to provide administrative services to the citizens.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
